tool_description: Live data from aircraft all over the world.
name: FlightBox
title: FlightBox

api_list.name: Type
api_list.description:
You can use up to 5 different aircraft types. Comma seperated.

e.g: b738,A388

api_list.name: Squawk
api_list.description: You can use up to 5 different codes. Comma seperated.

api_list.name: Registration
api_list.description: You can use up to 50 registrations. Comma seperated.

api_list.name: Icao
api_list.description: You can use up to 50 icao codes. Comma seperated.
